title: Are there any plans to tear up and repave Kerr Avenue between Market Street and MLK? It has to be one of the worst roads in all of Wilmington...next to Gordon Road between Kerr and College that it. I\'m surprised we have yet to hear of the City receiving auto repair bills from citizens.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9452
